titles: The vviddovves teares a comedie. As it was often presented in the blacke and white Friers. Written by Geor. Chap.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleet-street in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
